./summit-mini/package.json.dev: pnpm -C server dev & pnpm -C web dev
./summit-mini/package.json.build: pnpm -C server build && pnpm -C web build

./agents/multimodal/package.json.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts; else eslint . --ext .ts; fi

./intelgraph/package.json.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
./intelgraph/package.json.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
./intelgraph/package.json.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
./intelgraph/package.json.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

./intelgraph/server/package.json.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

./deepagent-mvp/package.json.prestart: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/src/agent/policies:/policies openpolicyagent/opa build -t wasm -e deepagent/authz /policies/opa.rego > src/agent/policies/policy.wasm

./package.json.test:smoke: npm run test:smoke:backend && npm run test:smoke:frontend
./package.json.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
./package.json.test:quarantine: echo 'Quarantine test placeholder - no flaky tests currently'
./package.json.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

./packages/network-graph/package.json.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx; else echo "skip lint (no src directory)"; fi

./packages/3d-visualization/package.json.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx; else echo "skip lint (no src directory)"; fi

./packages/migration-orchestrator/packag.build: node -e "console.log('build not required for js sources')"

./packages/sdk/package.json.generate: pnpm dlx openapi-typescript-codegen --input ../../openapi/intelgraph-core-api.yaml --output src/generated --client fetch --useOptions --exportSchemas true --indent 2 --name IntelGraphCoreClient

./packages/sdk/typescript/package.json.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

./packages/prov-ledger-verifier/package..verify:fixtures: pnpm run build && node dist/cli.js --bundle fixtures/valid-bundle --json && node dist/cli.js --bundle fixtures/valid-bundle.zip --json

./packages/cli/package.json.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

./packages/tasks-core/package.json.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test

./packages/map-visualization/package.jso.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx; else echo "skip lint (no src directory)"; fi

./packages/charting/package.json.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx; else echo "skip lint (no src directory)"; fi

./apps/mobile-native/package.json.pod-install: cd ios && bundle exec pod install
./apps/mobile-native/package.json.ios:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace IntelGraph.xcworkspace -scheme IntelGraph -configuration Release
./apps/mobile-native/package.json.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install

./apps/web/package.json.build:analyze:
ANALYZE=true vite build && echo '
 Bundle analysis available at dist/stats.html'
./apps/web/package.json.analyze:bundle: vite build && echo 'Bundle analysis available at dist/stats.html'

./apps/.desktop-electron-disabled/packag.lint: if [ -d src ]; then eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx; elif [ -d electron ]; then eslint electron --ext .ts,.tsx; else echo "skip lint (no lintable sources)"; fi

./apps/mobile/package.json.pod-install: cd ios && bundle exec pod install
./apps/mobile/package.json.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install
./apps/mobile/package.json.ios:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace IntelGraphMobile.xcworkspace -scheme IntelGraphMobile -configuration Release

./apps/.mobile-native-disabled/package.j.pod-install: cd ios && bundle exec pod install
./apps/.mobile-native-disabled/package.j.ios:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace IntelGraph.xcworkspace -scheme IntelGraph -configuration Release
./apps/.mobile-native-disabled/package.j.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install

./cli/package.json.pkg:all: npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:macos-arm && npm run pkg:windows

./client/package.json.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:vitest
./client/package.json.test:smoke: echo 'Client smoke tests are consolidated in root smoke-test.js'
./client/package.json.analyze:bundle: vite build && echo 'Bundle analysis available at dist/stats.html'

./ga-graphai/packages/policy/package.jso.test: vitest run && NODE_TEST=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--loader ts-node/esm node --test tests/policy-engine.test.js

./ga-graphai/packages/c2pa-bridge/packag.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser

./website/package.json.ci: pnpm -s lint && pnpm -s typecheck && pnpm -s test && pnpm -s build && pnpm -s e2e

./extensions/vscode-maestro/package.json.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
